website_summaries.verdict: While it has a lot of charging capabilities, it's also pricey and comes with some quality concerns and limitations.
pros: A versatile charger with a 80W output channel integrated power supply
Supports LiPo and many other battery types
Capable of charging most batteries quickly and effectively
cons: A few reports of portions of the board malfunctioning
Some types of batteries require extra leads to charge

customer_reviews.title: this duo charger dose not come with duo charging cables
customer_reviews.text: i bought this charger to charge two packs at a time. this unit comes with 9 adaptors no two alike. if you have a rc that runs on two packs this is not the charger you want.
customer_reviews.author: ALFIE

customer_reviews.title: Venom Pro Duo 80W X2 Dual issue - Venom has your back!
customer_reviews.text: This is my review of the Venom Pro Duo 80W X2 Dual. Purchased in May of 2019 and channel two stopped working by the end of June 2019. Was not a happy camper. After reporting the issue to Venom, they sent me a new charger! So end game is this: Chargers under $100 ish are very cheap. However when you have an awesome company like Venom that has your back, you can buy with confidence. Thanks Venom for standing behind what you sell!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rosema

customer_reviews.title: It's a charger. It works. Honestly what more do you people need?
customer_reviews.text: Venom has always been a good brand for chargers I personally trust. I recently bought an E Revo 2.0 so I came to need a charger capable of charging two batteries at once. Something that my Venom Pro 3 couldn't do. This charger can do it. Fit and finish looks good, it's very light for what it is. Seems easy enough to navigate. Another reviewer said it didn't come with two of the same plug. They aren't wrong, but here on Amazon the Venom charger plugs are $7 each at the time of this review. You won't find a more reliable, easy to use charger capable of charging two batteries at the same time in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it comes with the cable adaptor you need for your job. Unplug.the unit when you are done,
customer_reviews.text: Real nice unit. It took a little time and reading to get it working. Looks great and easy to transport. I was looking around the unit and I could not find a power switch. I am sure it must have an automatic timer switch. Being a two port charger I feel it should have two set of cables. A couple are doubled but not all. Of course, the one adapotor I needed did not have a double in the box. I had to order adaptors already before my first battery charging. I know they're coming out with smaller Digital chargers and they claim it works better, fast exc. I like this hands on style. It gives the user better/finer control.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rice

customer_reviews.title: your not done buying cables if you fly quads or drones
customer_reviews.text: was all excited to leard how to operate this overly complicated charger , to discovering that out of all the adapter cords this came with , that mine was not included . Not to mention if it were included it would have only been one so it says dual but they dont give you everything to have two batt going at once ..
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Essential Versatility
customer_reviews.text: As a first time buyer and user of an rc battery charger, I definitely found this this one less than intuitive. The operating manual is very small, and the flow charts are practically UNREADABLE even while wearing my reading cheaters. The overall quality of the build seems very nice, but only time will tell for its durability. It should meet my needs for quite some time. SO far I am only using 3S batteries with EC3 connectors. I will search for a downloadable user manual so that I can print the flow charts on larger papers.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Melaney

customer_reviews.title: Storage charge on here  is useless
customer_reviews.text: All my other chargers can go rundown batteries to a storage charge, and they will do it at whatever amperage i say when charging. Now when discharging they of course have to be slower to fit withing the limits of the discharge circuit. This charger however wil not charge a low battery to storage at full speed. It will keep you at 1 amp or less even if charging to storage voltage like after a day of bashing and you want to store your bats for next weekend. Its idiotic, unless im missing something.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B. Hirner

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Update: this charger is absolutely TERRIBLE at storage mode. Does only 1 amp in storage mode. And it hovers around the target voltage of 3.85 for ever. I can tell you my 6000 2S takes hours. It sucks. End of update. Simple interface. Learned it in 10 mins. Only issue I see with this Unit is that the lipo storage and discharge modes are limited to a max of 1.0 amp TOTAL regardless of cell count. That’s maddening! My older charger does any rate of current. Also the fan is crazy crazy LOUD. I really want to give it 3 stars but I’m gonna say 4 only cause I had a crap pier charger I rated 3.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Jester

customer_reviews.title: 6s charging needs? Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: For over $100, this is a weak charger.. took over an hour to charge a 6S 4,000mah pack. If you're looking to charge larger batteries I'd reccomend looking elsewhere. The interface is a bit iffy with the clack of the buttons. The red charge LED is far too bright to use in low light, without blinding you from reading the main screen. Included cables are lower quality, they took quite a bit of effort to fit into the balance plugs. The size is nicely compact, but so is the performance to dollar ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The charger works great easy to program. Needed to purchase extra leads to charge multiple of the same battery style plugs or use adapters to use 2 different style leads. Because it only comes with one of each style lead but it’s a 2 battery charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This reconditioned my old NiMH batteries
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to throw out a few of my old NiMH batteries that had been sitting in the closet for a few years. This charger has a charge/discharge/recharge function that totally reconditioned these batteries and allows them to work like new. I didn't realize, until reading the manual for this, that NiMH need to be stored fully drained. This charger will fully drain the batteries for you. I couldn't be happier with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: SC.

customer_reviews.title: Good charger but only 1A discharge
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to charge/discharge two batteries at once, it is easy to use, and it's small size is nice for transportation. My only problem with it is it will only discharge at 1amp which makes storage charging go very slowly sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: jim bob

customer_reviews.title: Custom 48 volt E-bike
customer_reviews.text: Good for now for people seeing it says 7 Amps don't think about getting that on 6s the voltage is too high to get that many amps on 80 watts. I wasn't expecting it but some people might be wondering why you only get 3.5 amps on a 6s battery. Other than that it is solid! I charge my dual 10000 mAh e bike batteries in about 2 hours. The interface is pretty similar to my turnigy accucell 6 for my drones I was only getting 2 amps and could only charge one battery at a time. I would recommend for a custom built 12 s 48v battery for e bike if you put 2 6s batteries in series.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Van Cleave

customer_reviews.title: Great charger!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is super simple to use and very compact. Its great to be able to charge two different types of batteries at the same time. Be sure to order extra cables if you plan to use two connection types at the same time. The XT60s I ordered were only about 5 bucks. Wish I would have ordered them at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: robert w woodring

customer_reviews.title: Only comes with one of each connector.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this thing and am blown away with the lack of consideration on the part of the manufacturer, this is a DUAL charger, bought specifically to charge two of the same batteries at once, and it only comes with ONE of each connector. Seriously. What the flop?!? For this much money it ought to come with two of each. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: logan zaske

customer_reviews.title: Great support.
customer_reviews.text: After a problem with the charger, Venom replaced it with a new one. As it turned out, the original charger was fine as the problem was with the balance board not the charger. The support person was extraordinarily helpful. He did everything he could to ensure a quick resolution to the problem. He knew I was anxious to charge my Lipo batteries. So far the charger has worked flawlessly. I’m hoping it will enjoy a long productive life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This seems a little more over-engineered than others, and that gives me a sense of confidence in the product. It's heavy, it has fans that move a ton of air, and it's got a handle built in... I mean, it's pretty neat. Menu is a little confusing at first but you get used to it. There are a lot of settings, and those settings have settings, too. It does a good job and I haven't had a fire yet, so that's cool.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: It isn't pretty but it is VERY comprehnsive
customer_reviews.text: This charger covers just about every base you can think of when it comes to charging various batteries. The build quality is very good and gives you that confidence that it will last you for a very long time. The menus are very deep with acronyms so learning how to use the program section to easily switch between your batteries and various modes will render good results.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Neely

customer_reviews.title: Best lipo charger for beginners and pro's alike.
customer_reviews.text: Once again Amazon held up to their promise of fast delivery and quality product. This is by far affordable and simple to use charger. This Venom duo is the must for even a beginner into the RC hobby. Having trouble with the instructions ? many you tube videos out there to helpyou all tho it's very simple to use and instructions are plainly written. Recommend this to all RC people
customer_reviews.author: jay morrissette

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use for the rookie
customer_reviews.text: Great charger with many many options. Make sure to watch the how to video on you tube upon set up make it much easier to understand comes with all the wires you’ll ever need and more I’m a rookie and this charger was easy to use charging my two venom 3cell batts
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT IS NEEDED NO MATTER THE CELL SIZE AND CAN CHARGE ALL THE WAY UP TO 7AMPS IF YOUR BATTERY CAN CHARGE THAT HIGH!
customer_reviews.author: RICH

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome package to have if you do any rc related stuff. I would give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: William Hartshorn

customer_reviews.title: Great charger! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! Great to be able to charge 2 batteries at the same time. Only complaint is that it only came with one xt60 cable and had to use a set from my old charger.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: An RC must have!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these since we have 4 RC cars. So far they are working great. They make a bigger 4 battery charge model but it was actually cheaper to buy to doubles. So we bought two doubles. They are expensive but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Great charger for pros or newbies
customer_reviews.text: Excellent charger even for a first time owner menus are a little difficult to learn but has a great instruction manual. Comes with every wire hook up you will need for any type of battery. Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Travis1210

customer_reviews.title: Venom is the most reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Venom is the most reliable. my second Pro model, 1st duo. Confidence in your LiPo charger is everything. House fires cost more than a good charger. WHY save money on a cheap alternative?
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good charger . Manual isn't great
customer_reviews.text: The instruction manual could be more clear. When balance charging you need to connect to the balance boards and the regular connectors. I mistakenly thought it was sufficient to connect to the balance board alone and couldnt understand why I was getting connection error. Maybe that's a dumb mistake , but it isn't explained in the directions . Otherwise it seems to work fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I need a charger that would charge multiple batteries, with multiple plug styles. You can do just about anything with this charger. With two banks, you can charge, discharge, balance and more simultaneously. It takes some reading to figure it all out, but if you're using lipo batteries, that's good. I wanted to make sure I had a quality and safe charger, this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: R Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: For the money I don’t see anything that comes close to this charger it is quick not fast but quick charges a 5000 mah 50c in around 1.5 mins or around a 1 and a half hours. 7400 mah battery in around 2.0 hours or so
customer_reviews.author: John bingo

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective, would emit very loud beeping that could not be stopped unless unit was completely unplugged. Seemed to run hot as well
customer_reviews.author: Eze

customer_reviews.title: Compact, well made charger
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, nice tho be able to charge multiple batteries/chemistry at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary  Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Over all great buy
customer_reviews.text: Dual charger , but it f you have 2 identical batteries you will need to buy an additional cable ,it only comes with 1 of each charger cable , but does come 2 boards for multiple cell lipo batteries
customer_reviews.author: Fred g.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like an electrical fire
customer_reviews.text: Just received the charger. Within minutes of charging I could smell what smelled like an electrical fire. I ran over and it turns out the air tht is blowing out of the charger just smells like a fire. The unit it self not even warm. Will be returning if the smell does not go away
customer_reviews.author: Madee

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass CHARGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great charger but the charging cable's that come with it are crap not even 12g wire
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I was going to send back I thought it was broken turned out it was operator error 😁 great product
customer_reviews.author: John b.

customer_reviews.title: Not much discharging capability.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice charger but pretty disappointed it will only discharge a 6S lipo ar 0.2 Amps
customer_reviews.author: Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and can charge 2 at a time.
customer_reviews.text: I know there are better chargers but this model works great and it fits nicely in the field box.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Works very well. I own 2 and wouldn't go with any other charger.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product will buy another
customer_reviews.text: This is in my opinion the best charger for hobby battery’s I use it to charge my 4s Lopo battery’s. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jrock

customer_reviews.title: HQ safe charger
customer_reviews.text: Amazing charger. I had to watch a video on how to use it but it saves all your settings which is very nice. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger
customer_reviews.text: I do like the charger it comes with all the cords it shows it has big righting in instruction book and is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Charles abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it did not come with charger but great product..
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger
customer_reviews.text: Great charger, I’m a rookie to the Bobbie so a little above my Above my pay grade working on educating myself about batteries
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great charger, worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! One of the best chargers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: VicThor

customer_reviews.title: great charger
customer_reviews.text: This a great charger. I had a battery that totally dead, a 3s with 2v in one cell and I was able get it charged fully with this. I thought the battery was gone for sure, but was able to save it with this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Collier

customer_reviews.title: usps dropped the ball
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Bought specifically from Amazon because of the one day shipping option. Ended up having to drive 30 minutes to the post office and pick it up otherwise I wouldn't have gotten it as promised.
customer_reviews.author: steve t.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Generally good products..except the fan is vibrating after only about 7 batteries charged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk and it says cables included but there not
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even have the cables to charge i had to get my own then it didn’t even charge my batteries don’t waste your money..buy the hi tech black edition
customer_reviews.author: Jason King

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Wish it came with two sets if each connectors since it is a dual charger
customer_reviews.author: Beretta

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Charges up my big 6S lipos with ease. Dual charging is awesome, connectors/wiring good quality. I like the cooling fan, always felt the other chargers got too hot.
customer_reviews.author: jpw3280

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for what it does. But it only charges at 7 amps per battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Brought it a month (and received it 2weeks) ago reading and comparing several other (temping) candidates. With all items in place and work as expected. Menu need to be more fine tuning but overall did its job well. Hope it last well!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Yeung

customer_reviews.title: It's a all around a good charger
customer_reviews.text: Only has 1 of each connector which makes it hard to charge two batteries. With the price you pay you should at least get two of each. Fan started making a loud noise shortly after buying it. Really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy smothers

customer_reviews.title: excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: excellent seller, very good quality product- arrived very fast to COLOMBIA
customer_reviews.author: Wilo Chavarro

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good charger worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Once you read through the directions on how to use it is an easy charger to use. And being my truck runs duel battery’s it’s real nice to be able to charge them at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted and needed. Great product
customer_reviews.author: james crinan

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome buy. The shipping was fast and safe !
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: perfwct
customer_reviews.text: Awesome a lot smaller than I thought but works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Shorty B

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but low power
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but not the fastest charger around for large capacity batteries
customer_reviews.author: goneXC

customer_reviews.title: Great little charger
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great I like I can charge 2 batteries at a time with this charger
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Annoying beeping!
customer_reviews.text: The beeping everytime you press a button scrolling or programing is so annoying. Please give it a "HUSH" mode! Make an adult sized manual with bigger font. Otherwise another great battery related product by Venom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Venom Pro Duo LiPo Battery Charger | 80W X2 AC DC 7A NiMH LiHV LiPo Balance Charger Discharger with Charger Adapter | LiPo 1S to 6S Airsoft, Drone, RC Battery Charger
product_meta.description:
The next evolution of the Venoms successful line of Pro chargers is here with the Venom Pro Duo dual 7.0A balance charger. Featuring a monolithic vertical stance, this charger saves valuable bench space by providing two complete charging circuits, each with its own dedicated 80W integrated power supply in a footprint equal to most single charger solutions. Having two dedicated power supplies in one compact package means both channels are able to receive 80W of power, ensuring you are not diluting your amp rate when charging a second pack. As an added bonus, you will not need to haul that separate power supply out to the track anymore. Menu navigation is easy using the five-button control interface and brightly backlit LCD screen. All the most common battery chemistries are supported: LiPo, LiHV LiFe, Li-Ion, NiMH, NiCD, and Pb (lead acid) with a complete assortment of charge leads included in the box with two extra long balance leads to make safe charging in a LiPo sack effortless. Get ready to upgrade to the newest addition to the Venom family of chargers, get your Venom Pro Duo 7.0A LiPo & NiMH charger today!Venom Limited Lifetime Warranty
We are certain of the quality of all Venom products. Therefore, all Venom products come with our Limited Lifetime Warranty, which covers defects in materials or workmanship for the life of the product. Venom will repair or, in its discretion, replace defective product free of charge for a period of 1 year from the original date of purchase. After that, for any defective product you will receive a credit equal to thirty percent (30%) of retail price (as shown on venompower.com) toward the purchase of a new Venom product of the same size and type. We reserve the right to substitute different sizes or types of replacement product for product sizes or types that have been discontinued.This is a non-transferable warranty and does not cover normal wear and tear, physical damage
feature_bullets: NOT YOUR AVERAGE BATTERY CHARGER | This isn’t your ordinary charger, it is a Venom Pro Duo Charger. It's easy to operate and comes fully loaded with features that balance charges individual cells of several types of battery fast and safe. Now, charging and balancing your RC batteries is no longer a worry. This battery charger comes complete with Charger, Bundle of Charge Leads (1 per type), 2 Balance Blocks, AC Power Cable, DC Power Cable, and Instruction Manual.

BALANCE CHARGES ALL TYPES OF BATTERIES | The Venom Pro is a multi-chemistry battery charger for Lithium - LiPo, LiHV, Li-Ion and Lithium Iron LiFe, Nickel Metal Hydride NiMH, Nickel Cadmium NiCD, and Lead Acid Pb based chemistry batteries. This LiPo charger includes one of each of the following charge lead adapter types: Alligator, Deans, EC3, EC5, JST, Receiver (RX), Tamiya, and XT60.

EASY TO USE, QUICK AND SAFE BALANCE CHARGING / DISCHARGING | Charging your 1S, 2S, 3S, 4S, 5S, or 6S LiPo batteries and other battery types has never been safer and easier. Two independent and dedicated charging circuits at 80 Watts each, totaling 160 Watts of power, reach a safe voltage to balance charge batteries again and again. Use it to charge your LiPo batteries fast and get back to racing.

LOADED WITH ADVANCED FEATURES AND FUNCTIONS | Functions include Charge, Balance Charge, Fast Charge, Storage Charge, Discharge, Cycling, and Battery Meter. You can also save up to 5 battery profiles for rapid recall. It has an Input Voltage of 100V-240V AC, or 11.0V - 18.0V DC for use on the go or in the field. The Pro Duo's lightweight frame comes in at under 2 lbs. (.90 Kg) and its integrated carry handle makes it easy to transport.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars275 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
